body: Fapped to this but later on checked the tags of the other uploads of the story. was this tagged wrong or what? I checked the other parts later and they list it as shotacon. But this reupload is not? I find it weird that a shota would be living on their own so idk if they are anymore. Now I feel a bit bad. Are they counting anything under 18 as shota? Or any prepubescent individual? The protaganist doesn't look prepubescent to me but idk. Contemplating whether I should turn myself in to the police. Or am I just overthinking this? I felt the mc looked a bit small but not overly small so I brushed over it. I have loli, shota and the like blacklisted and usually eyeball the characters bit this one didn't look too child like imo. Perhaos it's all just semantics  but would you consider the protag a prepubescent or pubescent? Any feedback on the matter would be appreciated.

I miss this author. Dude/Girl left hentai doujin and disappeared from pixiv and twitter. No news for his/her new pen name or if he/she is even alive.
Not much of a decensored since artist only puts the minimum black bars but I love this artist and really hope they finish the series. 9/10.
